amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for USAID.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 331 (Roll no. 308).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 331 (Roll no. 308).
